attributes.action: Start a campaign to highlight that spitting in the street is illegal.
attributes.additional_details: Professional footballers have much to answer for as they openly spit on the pitch, something that a certain segment of the public emulate. Surely NOW is the time to start a campaign to stop what is a disgusting and unhygienic habit.
attributes.background: ESPECIALLY with the COVID-19 crisis, please could the Government use the opportunity to highlight that spitting in the street is illegal.
